Name: maximize_budget
Description: Increase project budget to enable more features or resources.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Reduce the severity of blockers affecting task completion.

Name: maximize_velocity_improvement
Description: Improve team velocity over time to enhance productivity.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Achieve higher satisfaction levels in sprint retrospectives.

Name: minimize_feature_implementation_time
Description: Decrease the time taken to implement features from planning.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence_level
Description: Increase stakeholder influence level for better engagement.

Name: minimize_sprint_overdue_tasks
Description: Reduce the number of tasks that go overdue in sprints.

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Increase priority for critical features to be developed sooner.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Mitigate the effort required for individual tasks to streamline workload.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_relevance_to_feature
Description: Ensure stakeholders are relevant and involved with specific features.
